data.name: Activate_Annual
data.value: Thank you for purchasing an annual Advanced Support for Partners (ASfP) subscription

data.name: Activate_Banner
data.value: Microsoft Advanced Support for Partners Activation Details

data.name: Activate_Email_Invoice
data.value: You will receive your ASfP invoice by email (at {0}) for the amount of {1} USD approximately 15 days after your ASfP service start date.

data.name: Activate_Email_Invoice2
data.value: {0} will receive your ASfP invoice by email (at {1}) for the amount of {2} USD approximately 15 days after your ASfP service start date.

data.name: Activate_Invoicing_Date
data.value: Please be advised, standard invoicing dates are on the 15th and 27th of the month. Your invoicing date is determined by the date we have all required information to process your transaction. If we have all required information prior to the 14th of the month, the invoicing date will be on the 15th of the month. Otherwise, it will be the 27th of the month. Please be aware that this date cannot be changed once it is updated in Microsoft’s systems.

data.name: Activate_ManyThanks
data.value: Many thanks,

data.name: Activate_Monthly
data.value: Thank you for purchasing a monthly Advanced Support for Partners (ASfP) subscription

data.name: Activate_PA_Active
data.value: Your ASfP Transition Package will then be active for 12-months.

data.name: Activate_PA_Description
data.value: With this package, you gain access to great, new cloud benefits that come with ASfP. Plus, you will continue to receive the benefits we heard were most valued by you under the Dynamics Partner Advantage plans – including performance-based on-premises support incidents, MPN advisory hours and access to the Microsoft Dynamics training packs.

data.name: Activate_PA_SAM_Description
data.value: We have already started to activate your subscription in our systems and plan to finalize this by the week of {0}. You will receive an email confirming the completed activation from us. Once your subscription is active, {1}, your ASfP Services Account Manager (SAM), will also contact you to schedule a program overview session and share further details.

data.name: Activate_PAIntro_1
data.value: Thank you for purchasing the Advanced Support for Partners (ASfP) PA Transition Package.

data.name: Activate_PAIntro_2
data.value: Thank you for purchasing the Advanced Support for Partners (ASfP) PA Transition Package and {0}.

data.name: Activate_PAIntro_3
data.value: Thank you for purchasing the Advanced Support for Partners (ASfP) PA Transition Package, {0}, and {1}.

data.name: Activate_PAIntro_4
data.value: Thank you for purchasing the Advanced Support for Partners (ASfP) PA Transition Package, {0}, {1}, and {2}.

data.name: Activate_PAIntro_5
data.value: Thank you for purchasing the Advanced Support for Partners (ASfP) PA Transition Package, {0}, {1}, {2}, and {3}.

data.name: Activate_Partnership
data.value: We are excited to welcome you as an ASfP Partner and are looking forward to our continued partnership!

data.name: Activate_PleaseSend
data.value: To help expedite the onboarding process, please send us the following information:

data.name: Activate_PrgmOverview
data.value: Once your subscription is active, one of our ASfP Services Account Managers (SAM) will contact you to schedule a program overview session and share further details.

data.name: Activate_SendBillContact
data.value: The name and email details for your preferred billing contact person, if you would like us to send the invoice to someone in your organization other than you.

data.name: Activate_SendBillContact_Blue
data.value: Please send us the name and email details for your preferred billing contact person, if you would like us to send the invoice to someone in your organization other than you.

data.name: Activate_SendVAT_Blue
data.value: Please send us the VAT ID number you would like us to associate with your order within 3 business days, (by {0}), otherwise VAT will be added to your invoice.

data.name: Activate_SendVAT
data.value: The VAT ID number you would like us to associate with your order within 3 business days, (by {0}), otherwise VAT will be added to your invoice.

data.name: Activate_StartActivation
data.value: We have already started to activate ASfP for you in our systems and plan to finalize this by the week of {0}. You will receive an email confirming the completion of your activation.

data.name: Activate_Subject
data.value: Activation of your Advanced Support for Partners benefits; {0}

data.name: Activate_MeanTime
data.value: In the meantime, if you have any questions or urgent cloud support requests please contact your Services Account Manager (SAM) or email svcasfp@microsoft.com.

data.name: Submit_Contact_ASfP
data.value: A Microsoft representative will be contacting you within 72 hours (Business Hours: Monday to Friday 9am– 5pm Pacific Time Zone) to begin the subscription qualification process. At that time, we will verify the details of your order and begin processing your request.

data.name: Submit_Contact_PA
data.value: A Microsoft representative will be contacting you within 72 hours (Business Hours: Monday to Friday 9am– 5pm Pacific Time Zone) to begin the subscription qualification process. At that time, we will verify the details of your order and begin processing your request.

data.name: Submit_ContactUs
data.value: In the meantime, please feel free to reach out to Advanced Support for Partners at svcasfp@microsoft.com with any questions.
